alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; Northwest Monroe; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 12:03PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN BLOUNT AND NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 102 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, or 16 miles east of Madisonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Citico Beach, Talassee, Cades Cove, and Deals Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; Northwest Monroe; Southeast Monroe
